item.title: 美联储对中性的看法由米兰重新调整，这是通胀问题的关键所在
item.description: 美联储新任理事斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）在上个月的政策会议上呼吁大幅降息，但他的就职会议却引发了新一轮关于利率对经济的限制程度以及错误评估风险的讨论。【原文：New Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran may not have won converts to his call for steep interest rate cuts at last month's policy meeting, but his inaugural session has stirred fresh debate about how much rates are restricting the economy and the risks involved in getting that assessment wrong.】

item.title: 关注美联储评论和会议纪要，华尔街期货价格上扬
item.description: 由于投资者在等待美联储发言人的评论和央行 9 月份政策会议纪要的公布，美国股指期货在前一天下跌后于周三逐步走高。【原文：U.S. stock index futures inched higher on Wednesday after declines a day earlier as investors awaited commentary from Federal Reserve speakers and the release of minutes from the central bank's September policy meeting.】

item.title: 研究显示：欧洲小型企业在没有基本数字工具的情况下匆忙进入人工智能领域
item.description: 周三公布的一项研究显示，大多数欧洲中小型企业在整个业务中优先考虑人工智能系统，而不是基本的数字工具，在投资核心数字系统方面输给了大型企业。【原文：Most European small and mid-sized enterprises are prioritizing artificial intelligence systems over basic digital tools across their businesses, losing ground to bigger firms investing in core digital systems, a study published on Wednesday showed.】

item.title: 英央行FPC：如果对ai的预期变得不那么乐观，股票市场尤其容易受到影响
item.description: 这是一条突发新闻。全面报道将很快发布。【原文：This is a breaking news story. Full coverage will be available soon.】

item.title: 丰田和住友金属在固态电池阴极材料方面取得进展
item.description: 丰田公司和住友金属矿业公司周三表示，他们在电动汽车全固态电池阴极材料的开发方面取得了进展，并同意合作大规模生产这些材料。【原文：Toyota and Sumitomo Metal Mining said on Wednesday they have made advances in the development of cathode materials for all-solid-state batteries for electric cars, and have agreed to work together to mass produce those materials.】

item.title: 好莱坞、宝莱坞团体游说印度专家小组保护内容免受人工智能模型的影响
item.description: 信件显示，好莱坞和宝莱坞团体正在游说印度的一个小组，要求提供更严格的版权保护，以防止人工智能公司利用其知识产权来训练人工智能模型。【原文：Hollywood and Bollywood groups are lobbying an Indian panel for stricter copyright protection that will prevent artificial intelligence firms from using their intellectual property to train AI models, letters show.】

item.title: 消息人士称，伊拉克与埃克森公司将于周三签署马杰农油田协议
item.description: 三位伊拉克官方知情人士告诉路透社，伊拉克和埃克森美孚将于周三签署一项协议，管理、开发和运营伊拉克南部的马杰农油田。【原文：Iraq and Exxon Mobil will sign an agreement on Wednesday to manage, develop, and operate Majnoon oil field in southern Iraq, three Iraqi official sources with knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 如果财政忧虑加剧，投资者将重燃收益率曲线陡峭化的火焰
item.description: 债券市场仍在关注美国、欧元区和日本的预算问题，这意味着近期超长主权债券收益率的回落可能是短暂的，有可能重燃市场对今年流行的曲线陡峭化交易的兴趣。【原文：Bond markets remain focused on budget concerns in the U.S., euro zone and Japan, meaning the recent pullback in ultra-long sovereign yields may prove short-lived, potentially reigniting interest in this year's popular curve steepening trade.】

item.title: 欧盟推出 11 亿美元计划，在主权驱动下加强关键行业的人工智能发展
item.description: 欧盟委员会周三宣布了一项10亿欧元（11亿美元）的计划，以加强人工智能在关键行业中的应用，同时推动欧盟减少对美国和中国技术的依赖。【原文：The European Commission on Wednesday announced a 1-billion-euro ($1.1 billion) plan to ramp up the use of artificial intelligence in key industries amid a push to cut the European Union's reliance on U.S. and Chinese technologies.】

item.title: 戴姆勒卡车公司第三季度北美销量萎缩
item.description: 德国卡车制造商戴姆勒卡车公司周三发布报告称，由于北美卡车市场的疲软，该公司第三季度的销售额受到打击。【原文：Sales of Daimler Truck were hit by weakness in its Trucks North America segment in the third quarter, the German truck maker reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 安永调查显示，大多数公司在部署人工智能时都会遭受一些与风险相关的财务损失
item.description: 安永会计师事务所周三发布的一份调查报告称，几乎所有引入人工智能的大公司在最初都蒙受了一些经济损失，原因通常是合规失败、产出有缺陷、存在偏见或可持续发展目标受到干扰。【原文：Nearly every large company to have introduced AI has incurred some initial financial loss, an EY survey published on Wednesday said, often due to compliance failures, flawed outputs, bias, or disruptions to sustainability goals.】

item.title: 德国赫尔辛公司将收购澳大利亚水下无人机制造商
item.description: 德国赫尔辛公司（Helsing）将收购澳大利亚水下无人机制造商蓝海公司（Blue Ocean）。【原文：Germany's Helsing will acquire Australian underwater drone maker Blue Ocean, the defence startup said on Wednesday, as it looks to expand its AI-powered autonomous systems in the marine sector.】

item.title: 人工智能金融科技公司 Optasia 旨在南非上市融资 3.75 亿美元
item.description: 由 Ethos Capital 部分持股的金融科技公司 Optasia 周三表示，计划在南非约翰内斯堡证券交易所上市，并通过出售新股和现有股票相结合的方式筹集高达 63 亿兰特（约合 3.75 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Optasia, a fintech company partly owned by Ethos Capital, said on Wednesday it planned to list on South Africa's Johannesburg Stock Exchange and raise up to 6.3 billion rand ($375 million) by selling a combination of new and existing shares.】

item.title: Stellantis 在最新的高管调整中任命了欧洲和制造部门的新负责人
item.description: Stellantis 首席执行官安东尼奥-菲罗萨（Antonio Filosa）重新调整了该汽车制造商的高层，任命了欧洲业务和全球制造部门的新负责人，而在此之前，他刚刚任命了新的首席财务官。【原文：Stellantis CEO Antonio Filosa has reshuffled the automaker's top ranks, naming new heads for its European operations and global manufacturing, just days after appointing a new CFO.】

item.title: 英国 Vertu 汽车公司因 JLR 网络攻击遭受高达 740 万美元的损失
item.description: 英国汽车经销商 Vertu Motors 周三警告称，捷豹路虎汽车公司的网络安全事故将对其年度利润造成高达 550 万英镑（约合 740 万美元）的冲击，导致其股价在早盘交易中下跌 3.5%。【原文：British car dealer Vertu Motors on Wednesday warned of a hit of up to 5.5 million pounds ($7.4 million) to annual profit from disruptions due to a cybersecurity incident at Jaguar Land Rover, sending its shares down 3.5% in early trading.】

item.title: 起动机接线不当可能引发火灾，现代汽车将召回超过13.53万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周三表示，现代汽车将在美国召回135386辆圣达菲（Santa Fe）汽车，原因是起动机电机安装不当可能引发火灾，增加了碰撞时发生电气短路的风险。【原文：Hyundai Motor is recalling 135,386 Santa Fe vehicles in the U.S. due to fire risk from an improperly installed starter motor increasing the risk of an electrical short during a crash, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧佩克+限制增产，供应过剩担忧缓解，石油上涨
item.description: 油价周三上涨，原因是投资者消除了供应过剩的担忧，并消化了欧佩克+早些时候做出的下月限制增产的决定。【原文：Oil prices rose on Wednesday as investors brushed off oversupply fears, having digested a decision earlier by OPEC+ to restrain production increases next month.】

item.title: 全球忧虑推动黄金飙升至历史最高点
item.description: 对全球地缘政治和经济风险的担忧是推动黄金今年飙升 53% 至创纪录的每盎司 4,000 美元以上的最大动力，分析师认为几乎无法阻止黄金的飙升。【原文：Anxieties over global geopolitical and economic risks are the biggest drivers pushing gold's 53% surge this year to a record over $4,000 an ounce, with analysts seeing little to halt the surge.】

item.title: 据《回声报》报道，亚马逊将于 2027 年前在比利时投资 11.6 亿美元
item.description: 据《回声报》周三报道，美国科技巨头亚马逊计划从2025年至2027年在比利时投资10亿欧元（11.6亿美元）。【原文：U.S. tech giant Amazon plans to invest 1 billion euros ($1.16 billion) in Belgium from 2025 to 2027, newspaper L'Echo reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚林纳斯公司与诺维信公司合作向美国供应稀土磁铁
item.description: 澳大利亚林纳斯稀土公司（Lynas Rare Earths）与美国制造商Noveon Magnetics公司周三表示，双方将合作向美国国防和商业领域供应稀土永磁材料。【原文：Australia's Lynas Rare Earths has partnered with U.S.-based manufacturer Noveon Magnetics to supply rare-earth permanent magnets to defense and commercial sectors in the U.S., the two companies said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 钨价上涨加剧石油钻探商对通货膨胀的担忧
item.description: 钨是一种用于钻头等工业工具的稀有超硬金属，由于中国的出口管制挤压了供应，美国页岩钻探商正面临着钨价格上涨的问题，这对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提高美国化石燃料产量的雄心壮志构成了威胁。【原文：U.S. shale drillers are facing higher prices for tungsten, a rare, ultra-hard metal used for industrial tools like drillbits, as Chinese export controls have squeezed supply, threatening U.S. President Donald Trump's ambitions to boost America's fossil fuel production.】

item.title: 土耳其天然气转向威胁俄罗斯和伊朗最后的欧洲大市场
item.description: 到 2028 年底，土耳其可以通过提高产量和增加美国进口来满足其一半以上的天然气需求，这一转变有可能缩小俄罗斯和伊朗供应商在欧洲的最后一个主要市场。【原文：Turkey could meet more than half of its gas needs by the end of 2028 by ramping up production and increasing U.S. imports, in a shift that threatens to shrink the last major European market for Russian and Iranian suppliers.】

item.title: 预期下调后，宝马股价盘前下跌 3
item.description: 由于美国关税假设发生变化以及中国市场增长逊于预期，这家德国汽车制造商下调了2025年的盈利预期，宝马股价周三盘前下跌3%。【原文：BMW shares were seen down 3% in pre-market indications on Wednesday after the German carmaker cut its 2025 earnings forecast due to changed U.S. tariff assumptions and weaker-than-expected growth in the Chinese market.】

item.title: 英国 Revolut 公司将推出印度支付平台，目标是到 2030 年拥有 2000 万用户
item.description: 总部位于伦敦的数字金融公司 Revolut 周三表示，将在印度推出支付平台，这是该公司首次进军全球最大的数字支付市场之一，也是其全球扩张计划的一部分。【原文：London-based digital finance firm Revolut said on Wednesday it will launch its payment platform in India, its first foray into one of the world's largest digital payments markets, as part of a planned global expansion.】

item.title: ABB 将以 53.8 亿美元向软银出售机器人业务
item.description: 瑞士工程集团 ABB 周三表示，已同意将其机器人业务出售给软银集团，交易价值 53.8 亿美元。【原文：Swiss engineering group ABB on Wednesday said it has agreed to sell its robotics business to SoftBank Group in a deal that values the business at $5.38 billion.】

item.title: 加密货币将股票代币化的竞赛引发投资者保护问题
item.description: 加密货币公司竞相销售与股票挂钩的代币，这给传统金融公司和监管专家敲响了警钟，他们警告说，这种快速增长的新型产品给投资者和市场稳定带来了风险。【原文：A race by crypto companies to sell tokens pegged to stocks is raising alarm bells among traditional financial firms and regulatory experts who warn that the fast-growing novel products pose risks to investors and market stability.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：OpenAI、Anthropic 着眼于投资者资金，以解决人工智能诉讼
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周三援引知情人士的话报道称，OpenAI 和 Anthropic 正在探索利用投资者基金来解决潜在的数十亿美元诉讼。【原文：OpenAI and Anthropic are exploring the use of investor funds to settle potential multibillion-dollar lawsuits, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 本田在越南摩托车市场的控制力因电动车转换而显得摇摇欲坠
item.description: 根据行业数据和一项消费者调查的结果显示，本田在越南摩托车市场的主导地位正受到威胁，因为河内正在推动快速转向电动汽车，这对当地电动汽车制造商 VinFast 是一个鼓舞。【原文：Honda's dominance of Vietnam's motorbike market is under threat as Hanoi pushes for a rapid switch to electric vehicles in a boost to local EV maker VinFast , according to industry data and the findings of a consumer survey.】

item.title: 股市放缓，日元因政治忧虑而摇摆不定，黄金突破 4,000 美元
item.description: 周三，亚洲股市追随华尔街走低，投资者正努力应对法国和日本政治事件的影响，而美国政府的长期停摆则使黄金现货价格飙升至每盎司4000美元的创纪录水平。【原文：Asian stocks tracked Wall Street lower on Wednesday as investors grappled with the fallout from political drama in France and Japan, while a prolonged U.S. government shutdown catapulted gold spot prices to a record $4,000 per ounce level.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，数据流软件制造商 Confluent 正在探索出售事宜
item.description: 据三位熟知内情的人士透露，Confluent 公司在吸引了收购兴趣后，正在探索出售事宜，这是最新一家因其在支持人工智能发展方面的潜力而吸引收购者的数据基础设施公司。【原文：Confluent is exploring a sale after attracting acquisition interest, according to three people familiar with the matter, the latest data infrastructure company to draw suitors for its potential in supporting artificial intelligence development.】
